function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of coronavirus due to non-compliance with social distancing measures and stay-at-home guidelines.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and potential strain on healthcare system.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, public education, and promotion of telecommuting.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote work technology, and virtual communication tools.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and essential service providers.","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and employers."},{"Description":"Dissemination of unverified or misleading information about coronavirus and public health measures.","Impact":"Heightened confusion, panic, and non-compliance with official guidelines.","Mitigation":"Fact-checking, public health education campaigns, and promotion of verified sources.","Technologies":"Online fact-checking tools, official communication channels, and digital information platforms.","People":"General public, media outlets, and social media users.","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and media regulatory bodies."}]}
